title: 07/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/22/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin appreciates Jerry Jones finally taking the blame for the fallout with Head Coach Jimmy Johnson. Texas and Oklahoma reached out to the SEC about interest in joining their conference. Big Ben's weight has never been the problem in Pittsburgh, and Aaron Rodgers needs to start seeing what he does have rather than the things he doesn't have.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
